attributes.action: Introduce measures to  discourage petitioning activity by the ignorant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the interests of democracy would be better served if people who can't check basic facts were discouraged from raising petitions. 

We also believe that people should be given incentives not to sign petitions which contain elementary spelling or grammatical errors.

To this end we propose that penalties should be imposed for: -

1) Raising petitions based on false premises, with sentences up to life imprisonment for those proven to have deliberately misrepresented as fact things which a quick check on google would have shown to be nonsense.

2) That those signing petitions containing basic language errors should be presented for public ridicule and humiliation in the stocks.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
